About ChitChat

Revolutionizing communication with real-time messaging and seamless collaboration

Privacy First
Real-Time
No Storage
Frontend Only

Our Mission

To revolutionize online communication by providing a truly private, frontend-only chat platform where conversations remain ephemeral and leave no digital footprint.

Privacy

Why Choose ChitChat?

True Privacy

Unlike other chat apps that claim privacy but store data, we literally can't store your messages - there's no backend to store them in.

No Accounts Needed

Start chatting instantly. No sign-ups, no passwords, no personal information required. Just open and chat.

Lightning Fast

With no server roundtrips or database queries, messages are delivered instantly through peer-to-peer connections.

Zero Knowledge

We can't read your messages even if we wanted to - all communication happens directly between users.

No Tracking

No analytics, no cookies, no user tracking. Your privacy is our top priority.

Open Source

Fully transparent codebase. Verify our privacy claims yourself - see exactly how your data is handled.

Powerful Features

No Backend Storage

Pure frontend application - no servers, no databases. Your chats exist only in your browser's memory.

Browser-Only Chat

All messages stay in your browser. Close the tab or refresh, and everything disappears completely.

Direct Peer Chat

Connect directly with other users through WebRTC. No intermediary servers storing your conversations.

Session-Only Messages

Messages exist only during your active session. Refresh the page for a fresh, clean start.

Client-Side Only

Everything runs in your browser. No external servers or databases involved in storing messages.

Temporary Memory

Chats stored temporarily in browser memory. Close the tab, and all traces of conversations vanish.
